name: 69 Erika Love
description:
69 Erika Love - Play an exciting puzzle game with Erika. Everyone's beloved Miss Erica stays after class especially for you. Collect all the pieces of the puzzle and open the reward. Relaxing music and meditative gameplay will allow to have a good rest after work .
Features
16 unique levels in Full HD
Relaxing music
Meditative gameplay
16 Achievements
Additional lessons for you personally!
